name: Peace and Conflict Studies Independent Study Course
description: Independent study in the area of Peace and Conflict Studies. It is designed to provide students with the opportunity to explore topics not covered in the curriculum, or to develop a more detailed focus on topics covered. Approval of the Program Director is required. The student must obtain the written agreement of the instructor who will supervise the independent study. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
department: Munk School of Global Affairs and Public Policy
